title: Castle Rock S1E06 Explained
author: Think Story
comment: Not sure if you missed it or if you thought it wasn’t important, but the actor that plays Wendell played Micheal Hanlon as a kid in the newest movie of IT

ok so here's my theory: what if on the night that Henry disappeared and Matthew was thrown off the cliff, Matthew was going to make Henry "perfect" by taking away his hearing the same way that Odin took away his own. That would explain why Henry felt afraid and then relieved. I'm also thinking The Kid is the one who pushed Matthew off and took Henry into a hiding place and that's where the flashback of him playing with a toy truck comes from. So many theories and questions I just need answers now!!!!
Since they're featuring actors/actresses from King films in the show they should have Kathy Bates in season 2.
I think you are on to something about Odin being Henry real father.  My hubby and I thought that also.
If a dude asks you to get in a soundproofed Rv you run like the wind...
description:
I delve into season one, episode six of Castle Rock "Filter" and look at the hidden details, mysteries, easter eggs and Stephen King references.
